author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...ERIN STILL A FORMIDABLE CATEGORY 4 HURRICANE UNDERGOING STRUCTURAL CHANGES... ...HEAVY RAINS AND GUSTY WINDS OCCURING OVER PUERTO RICO AND THE VIRGIN ISLANDS...
summary: ...ERIN STILL A FORMIDABLE CATEGORY 4 HURRICANE UNDERGOING STRUCTURAL CHANGES... ...HEAVY RAINS AND GUSTY WINDS OCCURING OVER PUERTO RICO AND THE VIRGIN ISLANDS... As of 11:00 PM AST Sat Aug 16 the center of Erin was located near 20.3, -65.1 with movement WNW at 14 mph. The minimum central pressure was 937 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 140 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Erin (AT5/AL052025)
